<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Corrupt Shieldmarshal](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1986)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #180: The Smoking Gun](/Sources.aspx?ID=125) pg. 7</row>

**Perception** +18; (20 to [Sense Motive](/Actions.aspx?ID=85) or vs. [Conceal An Object](/Actions.aspx?ID=61)) 

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Dwarven](/Languages.aspx?ID=3), [Kelish](/Languages.aspx?ID=38)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +17, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +15, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +15, [Legal Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +5

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10), _+1 [clan pistol](/Feats.aspx?ID=3281)_ or _+1 [jezail](/Weapons.aspx?ID=203)_, [Longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 25 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +18 

**Will** +12 

</row>

**HP** 120

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
longsword +17 ([versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d8+7 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_clan pistol_ +19 ([Concussive](/Traits.aspx?ID=401), [fatal d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=178), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 80 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_jezail_ +19 ([Concussive](/Traits.aspx?ID=401), [fatal aim d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=178), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 90 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d8+3 piercing

**Firearms Critical Specialization**   When the shieldmarshal makes a critical hit with a [firearm](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=16) weapon, the target must succeed at a DC 25 Fortitude save or be [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36).

**Lawbringer** <actions string="Single Action" />  The shieldmarshal marks a foe for judgment, granting the shieldmarshal a +10-foot circumstance bonus to Speed whenever it Strides toward that creature. The shieldmarshal's Strikes against that creature deal an additional 2d8 precision damage.

**Reloading Strike** <actions string="Single Action" />  The shieldmarshal makes a melee Strike against an opponent within reach and Interacts to reload a firearm in their other hand.

</column>
name: Corrupt Shieldmarshal
